title: Card terminal - won't connect to POS (German RIAB customers)
text: when a german customer gets a new card terminal, the following change has to be made to get the pos to communicate with the new terminal: 1. open pos/program/bin/debug/printer/configuration/esc koder.txt 2. scroll down to [germanbankingconfig] 3. change port to com1 (if different) 4. change stopbit to 2 (if different) 5. restart pos if it still doesn't work, repeat above steps and set stopbit to 1.
